Package planeair.graph.graphutil

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractElement
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AbstractNode
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.AdjacencyListNode
org.graphstream.graph.implementations.SingleNode
planeair.graph.graphutil.Flight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<org.graphstream.graph.Edge>, org.graphstream.graph.Element, org.graphstream.graph.Node
public class Flight extends org.graphstream.graph.implementations.SingleNode
Flight extends SingleNode, from GraphStream, and is a node of a FlightsIntersectionGraph. /!\ uses the GraphStream attribute
Author:
Luc le Manifik

  • Method Details

    • setFlightAttributes

      public void setFlightAttributes(Airport departureAirport, Airport arrivalAirport, NTime departureTime, int flightDuration) throws NullPointerException, InvalidEntryException
      Initialize the attributes of a Flight.
      Parameters:
      departureAirport - The name of the Airport it came from
      arrivalAirport - The name of the Airport it goes
      departureTime - The hour of the departure
      flightDuration - The duration of the flight, in MINUTES
      Throws:
      NullPointerException
      InvalidEntryException

    • setFlightDuration

      public void setFlightDuration(int flightDuration) throws InvalidEntryException
      Set the duration flight of the Flight
      Parameters:
      flightDuration - The new duration flight of the Flight
      Throws:
      InvalidEntryException - Threw if the flight duration is inferior or equals to 0

    • setFlightWaypoint

      public void setFlightWaypoint(FlightWaypoint flightWaypoint)
      Set the Flight Waypoint related to this flight
      Parameters:
      flightWaypoint - the flight waypoint linked to this flight if null, will also deselect its waypoint button before setting it the waypoint to null
      See Also:
      • MapWaypointButton

    • isBooming

      public boolean isBooming(Flight tangoCharlie, double timeSecurity)
      Check if the Flight passed in parameter is exploding with the current Flight. It does not consider the different layers
      Parameters:
      tangoCharlie - The Flight with wich we check the collision
      timeSecurity - The value below which we consider that two Flights are in collision
      Returns:
      Returns "true" if the two Flights are EXPLODING with each other, else "false"

    • getGeoPositionAtTime

      public org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition getGeoPositionAtTime(NTime time)
      This function position of the Flight at the specified NTime. It considers the departure Airport's coordinates, the arrival Airport's coordinates and the current time to calculate it's real position.
      Parameters:
      time - The NTime which indicates when we want to paint the Flight
      Returns:
      currentGeoPosition (GeoPosition) - The current GeoPosition of the Flight if it is currently flying. Else, returns "null".

    • fireSelectionUpdated

      public void fireSelectionUpdated(boolean isSelected)
      Tells this flight's waypoint that its selection has to be updated if it exists Also fire goofy aah word :)
      Parameters:
      isSelected - whether or not the waypoint is selected
